member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY
member.summary: Holds thread information returned by PssWalkSnapshotPssWalkSnapshot.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.ExitStatus
member.summary: The exit code of the process. If the process has not exited, this is set to STILL_ACTIVE (259).

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.TebBaseAddress
member.summary: The address of the thread environment block (TEB). Reserved for use by the operating system.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.ProcessId
member.summary: The process ID.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.ThreadId
member.summary: The thread ID.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.AffinityMask
member.summary: The affinity mask of the process.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.Priority
member.summary: The thread’s dynamic priority level.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.BasePriority
member.summary: The base priority level of the process.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.LastSyscallFirstArgument
member.summary: Reserved for use by the operating system.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.LastSyscallNumber
member.summary: Reserved for use by the operating system.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.CreateTime
member.summary: The time the thread was created. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.ExitTime
member.summary: If the thread exited, the time of the exit. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.KernelTime
member.summary: The amount of time the thread spent executing in kernel mode. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.UserTime
member.summary: The amount of time the thread spent executing in user mode. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.Win32StartAddress
member.summary: A pointer to the thread procedure for thread.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.CaptureTime
member.summary: The capture time of this thread. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.Flags
member.summary: Flags about the thread. For more information, see PSS_THREAD_FLAGS.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.SuspendCount
member.summary: The count of times the thread suspended.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.SizeOfContextRecord
member.summary: The size of ContextRecord, in bytes.

member.name: PSS_THREAD_ENTRY.ContextRecord
member.summary: A pointer to the context record if thread context information was captured. The pointer is valid for the lifetime of the walk marker passed to PssWalkSnapshot.
